bannerDescription: Hover on a circle to learn about each component.

hotspots.title: Side Panels
hotspots.description: The finishing touch that caps off your closet system, giving it a polished and complete appearance.

hotspots.title: Center Panels
hotspots.description: These panels connect multiple sections seamlessly, maximizing space and creating a clean, uniform look.

hotspots.title: Drawers
hotspots.description: Sleek, soft-closing drawers available in two heights to organize and conceal your items neatly.

hotspots.title: Cubbies
hotspots.description: Versatile open compartments ideal for shoes, accessories, or decorative items.

hotspots.title: Shoe Shelves
hotspots.description: Specialized shelves with a front lip to securely display and organize footwear of all kinds. Available in straight & slanted.

hotspots.title: Shelves
hotspots.description: Adjustable and sturdy flat surfaces for flexible storage of folded clothing, boxes, or decor.

hotspots.title: Hanging Rods
hotspots.description: Durable rods that efficiently hold your hanging clothes, from shirts to long garments.
